import puppeteer from'puppeteer';const fetchPitchforkArticles=async()=>{const url="https://pitchfork.com/news/";const browser=await puppeteer.launch();const page=await browser.newPage();await page.goto(url);const allArticles=await page.evaluate(()=>{const articles=document.querySelectorAll('.module.latest-module.collection-module.news-module.latest-module--horizontal');return Array.from(articles).slice(0,3).map(article=>{var _article$querySelecto;const title=article.querySelector('h2').innerText;const image=(_article$querySelecto=article.querySelector('img'))===null||_article$querySelecto===void 0?void 0:_article$querySelecto.src;// Extract the image src
const url=article.querySelector('a').href;return{title,image,url};});});await browser.close();return allArticles;};export default fetchPitchforkArticles;
